text: The Alexander ALX500 is a double-decker body of a bus. It has a low floor. It was made from 1997 to 2004 by Alexander. The ALX500 body could be built on the Dennis Trident 3 chassis and the Volvo Super Olympian chassis. The ALX500 was only sold in In Hong Kong, It was sold to Citybus, Kowloon Motor Bus, Long Win Bus, New World First Bus and Kowloon-Canton Railway Corporation.
